name: Banana.Core
tagline: High level library for managing iOS' devices.
body:
### What's Banana.Core?
Banana.Core is a high level library for managing iOS device written in C# using libimobiledevice instead of Apple's MobileDevice.dll

### Make your iTunes alternative easily!
With few functions you'll be able to make your own "iTunes software"
 
### Download a precompiled versi√≥n
<https://github.com/BananaProject/Banana.Core/releases/download/banana.core/Release.zip>

### Documentation
<https://github.com/BananaProject/Banana.Core/wiki/Documentation>
### Code friendly!
Made for beeing easy for developers. Made for beeing sexy for users.

### Help me making it bigger!
Upload your examples and upload your updates! Let's break iTunes!
### Open source!
Do you want to build your own library? Then download the source code and pull here your updates! :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
